description:
The New CCNP Security exam (SIMOS 300-209) has been introduced by Cisco at the place of Old CCNP Security exam (VPN). In this course I have mainly focused on Cisco IOS VPNs.

In this Comprehensive Course I have covered Following Technologies.

Introduction of IPSec Terminology

  • IPSec Demo
  • IPSec Features
  • IPSec Protocols
  • IPSec Modes
  • IKE Modes & Phases
  • IKE Versions
  • ESP & AH
  • NAT-T

Implementation of Site-Site VPN

  • IOS-ASA Site Site With Pre
  • IOS Site Site With Aggressive Mode
  • IOS Site Site With GRE Over IPSec
  • IOS Site Site With IOS CA
  • IOS Site Site With IPv6
  • IOS Site Site With MS CA
  • IOS Site Site With Pre-Shared
  • IOS Site Site With Self- Signature
  • IOS Site Site With Stateful Failover
  • IOS Site Site With Stateless Failover
  • IOS Site Site With Static VTI

Implementation of Remote Access VPN

  • IOS Remote Access Demo
  • IOS Remote Access DHCP & Group Lock
  • IOS Remote Access With DVTI Pre-Shared
  • IOS Remote Access With IOS CA
  • IOS Remote Access With MS CA
  • IOS Remote Access Client Mode
  • IOS Remote Access Network Extension Mode
  • IOS Remote Access Network Extension Plus Mode
  • IOS Remote Access With Pre-Shared

Implementation of SSL VPN

  • IOS SSL VPN Demo
  • IOS SSL Clientless
  • IOS SSL Thick Client
  • IOS SSL Thin Client
  • IOS SSL High Availability
  • IOS SSL Single Gateway Multiple Context

Implementation of DMVPN VPN

  • IOS DMVPN Demo
  • IOS DMVPN DUAL HUB Single DMVPN Wtih EIGRP
  • IOS DMVPN DUAL HUB Single DMVPN Wtih OSPF
  • IOS DMVPN With EIGRP
  • IOS DMVPN With IKEv2
  • IOS DMVPN With OSPF
  • IOS DMVPN With Phases
  • IOS DMVPN With MS CA

Implementation of GET VPN

  • IOS GET Demo
  • IOS GET With COOPS With Pre-Shared
  • IOS GET With IOS CA
  • IOS GET Multicast With Pre-Shared
  • IOS GET Unicast With Pre-Shared

Implementation of Flex VPN

  • IOS Flex VPN Demo
  • IOS Flex Remote Access With IPv4
  • IOS Flex Remote Access With IPv6
  • IOS Flex Site-SiteWith Minimum Commands
  • IOS Flex Site-Site With Static VTI
  • IOS Flex Site-Site Classic Method
  • IOS Flex Site-Site With IPv6

Contents and Overview

Including 14+ Hours video Training & 60+ lectures are Downloadable.

This course covers necessary Cisco Secure Mobility Solution (SIMOS) all VPN concepts in simple words.

Upon completion students will be able to configure implement & t-shoot the Cisco IOS VPNs like Site-Site, Remote Access, SSL, DMVPN, GETVPN, Flex VPN deployment in real environment & lab environment.

What are the requirements?

  • A familiarity of Routing on Cisco Routers
  • A familiarity of Switching on Cisco Switches
  • Have GNS3 installed and functioning
  • Have Oracle Virtual Box & Microsoft Operating systems

What is the target audience?

  • Cisco CCNP Security certification candidates or anyone interested in learning networking basics.
  • IT professionals and managers who want to understand and learn this hot new security technology.
title: CCNP Security 300-209 SIMOS With B S Deshwal CCIE 37094
